import { set } from 'mongoose' import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Toast, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' export default function ToastComponent(props) { const [showToast, setToast] = useState(true) return (
setToast(false)} show= {setToast} > {props.name} 50 mins ago {props.message}
) }
